
Code Effects Software © 2013



Thank you for downloading Web Rule, free version!


Here is what you need to know about the Web Rule package:

-- The CodeEffects.Rule.dll file is your copy of Web Rule. It is ready to use. Just reference it in your code (.NET 4.0 and up) and begin programming. No installation is required.

-- Copy the CodeEffects.Rule.xml file into the /bin directory of your project in order to have full IntelliSense support of Web Rule assembly in Visual Studio. Do not rename this file.

-- By referencing or otherwise using the Web Rule assembly, your organization agrees to be bound by Web Rule's EULA. The EULA.htm file is included in the package.

-- ASP.NET and MVC Visual Studio 2010 demo projects are available for download at http://rule.codeeffects.com/Doc/Business-Rule-Demo-Project.

-- Your Web Rule license includes free customer support. Any employee of your organization is welcome to ask any Web Rule-related question or express any concern. Use our Support page located at http://rule.codeeffects.com/support or email us at public.support@codeeffects.com. Our official business hours are from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (US Eastern time) every day except weekends and U.S. holidays, although we may answer your questions even during off hours.

-- Web Rule provides online documentation located at http://rule.codeeffects.com/Doc. This is a great place to learn everything about Web Rule.

-- We publish product news and details of each release of Web Rule on our web log at http://blog.codeeffects.com. We also maintain a Twitter account @CodeEffects. These are  great places to see what's new with Web Rule. You can also subscribe to our RSS feed at http://feeds.feedburner.com/CodeEffectsRss or to our email product notifications at our Support page. We don't send out junk email, and we don't sell/give your address to anybody unless it's required by law. You can find our Privacy Policy at http://rule.codeeffects.com
